name: WePiggy Coin
description: What Is WePiggy? WePiggy is an open source, non-custodial crypto asset lending market protocol. In Wepiggyâ€™s market, users can deposit their crypto assets to earn interest, or borrow others by paying interests. WePiggy Coin WePiggy Coin (WPC) is the governance token of WePiggy protocol, with a total amount of about 8 billion, which is completely generated through mining, no VC allocation, no private sale, no pre-mining.
